belongs_to_collection.name: The Six Million Dollar Man Movie Collection

original_title: The Six Million Dollar Man: The Solid Gold Kidnapping
overview: A criminal organization known as OSO specializes in kidnapping high ranking U.S. representatives. Although Steve Austin has already thwarted one of their kidnappings, he is unable to stop them from grabbing William Henry Cameron right from under OSI's nose. OSO demands one million dollars in gold and Oscar Goldman takes the opportunity to try and lure them out into the open. Meanwhile, Steve accompanies Dr. Erica Bergner, who is testing a new method of brain transferal in order to find out where Cameron is being kept.
title: The Six Million Dollar Man: The Solid Gold Kidnapping
